Notes: A drill-like enemy that moves along a set path. It damages the player upon contact. It can be defeated by stomping, drilling or Ground Pounding it. Furthermore, can be eaten by Yoshi and frozen by the Orange Luma.

Obj_arg0.Name: Pose Type
Obj_arg0.Description: Specifies how it moves along the path.

Values.Notes: Always turn to path's front direction

Point_arg0.Name: Wall Drill Type
Point_arg0.Description: Specifies the wall drilling action to perform at this point.

SW_AWAKE.Description: The object will become visible and resume movement when this switch is activated.

Rail.Description: The path that it moves on.
